question_text: There is less information in the book than there is on the website. The sentence which has a similar meaning to the one above is ………………………

choices.A: there isn’t as much information on the website as in the book.
choices.B: the information in the book is more than the information on the website.
choices.C: there isn’t as much information in the book as on the website.
choices.D: the information on the website is less than the information in the book.
